titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2346) making supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2009, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2346) making supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2009, and for other purposes.

action.text: All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI. The amendment printed in the report shall be considered as adopted. All points of order against provisions of the bill, as amended, are waived.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 111-107, by Mr. Perlmutter.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 53.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 434.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 240 - 188 (Roll no. 261).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 247 - 178 (Roll no. 262).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2346) making supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2009.
